title: Democratic Renovation
text: The Democratic Renovation ("Rénovation Démocratique") is a <a href="political%20party">political party</a> in <a href="Mauritania">Mauritania</a>. The party won 2 out of 95 seats in the 19 November and 3 December 2006 <a href="Mauritanian%20parliamentary%20election%2C%202006">elections</a>.
